curam.util.transaction

Class SQLQueryCacheUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.transaction.SQLQueryCacheUtil

  • public final class SQLQueryCacheUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains utility methods for the transaction SQL query cache.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Object[] deepCloneArray(java.lang.Object[] objects)
      This method clones the set of objects passed in.

      Extracts and returns the name of the table involved in the specified SQL statement.

      Extracts and returns the name of the table involved in the DELETE SQL statement.

      Extracts and returns the name of the table involved in the INSERT SQL statement.

      Extracts and returns the name of the table involved in the UPDATE SQL statement.

      Returns a flag to indicate if the transaction SQL query cache has been enabled or not.

    • Method Detail

      • extractTableFromSQLStatement

        public static java.lang.String extractTableFromSQLStatement(java.lang.String sqlStatement)
        Extracts and returns the name of the table involved in the specified SQL statement. This function is called for non-query SQL statements which include INSERT, UPDATE and DELETE statements.
        Parameters:
        sqlStatement - The SQL statement being examined.
        Returns:
        The name of the

      • extractTableNameFromInsert

        public static java.lang.String extractTableNameFromInsert(java.lang.String sqlStatement)
        Extracts and returns the name of the table involved in the INSERT SQL statement.
        Parameters:
        sqlStatement - The SQL statement being examined.
        Returns:
        The name of the table involved in the INSERT SQL statement.

      • extractTableNameFromUpdate

        public static java.lang.String extractTableNameFromUpdate(java.lang.String sqlStatement)
        Extracts and returns the name of the table involved in the UPDATE SQL statement.
        Parameters:
        sqlStatement - The SQL statement being examined.
        Returns:
        The name of the table involved in the UPDATE SQL statement.

      • extractTableNameFromDelete

        public static java.lang.String extractTableNameFromDelete(java.lang.String sqlStatement)
        Extracts and returns the name of the table involved in the DELETE SQL statement.
        Parameters:
        sqlStatement - The SQL statement being examined.
        Returns:
        The name of the table involved in the DELETE SQL statement.

      • isSQLQueryCacheEnabled

        public static boolean isSQLQueryCacheEnabled()
        Returns a flag to indicate if the transaction SQL query cache has been enabled or not.
        Returns:
        True if the transaction SQL query cache has been enabled, otherwise false.

      • runWithSQLQueryCacheDisabled

        public static void runWithSQLQueryCacheDisabled(java.lang.Runnable run)
        Runs this runnable bypassing the query cache. Do NOT run code in the runnable that would invalidate entries in the SQL query cache.
        Parameters:
        run - the runnable to run

      • deepCloneArray

        public static java.lang.Object[] deepCloneArray(java.lang.Object[] objects)
        This method clones the set of objects passed in.
        Parameters:
        objects - Contains the objects to clone.
        Returns:
        A list of the cloned objects.
